author: apetrelli
msg: Added "source" and "javadoc" Maven plugins to be attached in the release profile.

author: damrhei
msg: Allow JAXBUtils.getJAXBContext to optionally be passed in a
classloader that will be used when retrieving a JAXBContext
from its cache. In the absence of this optional classloader
the behavior will be the same as before.

author: rhs
msg: made the session usable from multiple threads (hopefully)
